meanings.definition: A loose, long-sleeved, collarless pullover made of soft, absorbent fabric, typically worn during athletic activity or as casual wear.
meanings.sent1: I wore my favorite sweatshirt to the gym for my workout.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new sweatshirt to stay warm during the chilly evenings.
meanings.sent3: The sweatshirt looked like a cozy hug waiting to be worn.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a well-worn sweatshirt.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sweatshirt stood out in the sea of dark jackets.

meanings.sent1: I will sweatshirt my hoodie when we go for a walk.
meanings.sent2: He sweatshirted his favorite pullover before heading out.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to sweatshirt your jacket before going outside.
meanings.sent4: She decided to sweatshirt her cozy sweater for the movie night.
meanings.sent5: Remember to sweatshirt your sweatshirt before leaving the house.
